titleStmt.title: Deuout psalmes and colletes gathered and set in suche order, as may be vsed for dayly meditacions.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Flete strete, at the signe of the Sunne, ouer agaynste the Conduyte, by Edwarde Whitchurche,
publicationStmt.date: the .v. daye of Nouember, in the yeare of our Lorde. 1547.] Anno. 1.5.6.7. [i.e. 1547]

notesStmt.note: Place of publication, printer's name, and correct publication date from colophon.
Identified as STC 20478 on UMI microfilm.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
